Undocumented Python objects
===========================
spheres.visualization
---------------------
Classes:
 * MajoranaSphere -- missing methods:

   - mouseclick
   - mousemove
   - toggle_axes
   - toggle_phase
   - toggle_phase_draggable
   - toggle_rotation_axis
   - toggle_sphere_draggable
   - toggle_stars_draggable
   - toggle_trails
   - toggle_wavefunction
